医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
儿童期 SLE 器官损伤预测因素的新见解儿童期发病的系统性红斑狼疮 (cSLE) 是一种慢性、严重的自身免疫性疾病，有早期器官损伤的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/New-insights-into-predictors-of-organ-damage-in-childhood-onset-SLE.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/New-insights-into-predictors-of-organ-damage-in-childhood-onset-SLE.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f23ea91-53de-444d-8f80-360f9df30d14 Fri, 14 Jun 2024 09:44:00 -0400 New insights into predictors of organ damage in childhood-onset SLE
应对儿童关节炎向成人护理过渡的挑战风湿病会影响儿童时期的人们，最常见的是幼年特发性关节炎 (JIA)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Tackling-challenges-in-childhood-arthritis-transition-to-adult-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Tackling-challenges-in-childhood-arthritis-transition-to-adult-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54ad8de9-af20-43f5-82bc-c8f78057c25b Fri, 14 Jun 2024 09:33:00 -0400 Tackling challenges in childhood arthritis transition to adult care
彻底改变生命科学：就 ASMS、SCIEX 7500+ 系统和 AI 驱动的定量对 SCIEX 进行采访在我们最新的采访中，News Medical 与生命科学分析技术领域的全球领导者 SCIEX 进行了对话，了解他们在 ASMS 上发布的令人兴奋的 SCIEX 7500+ 系统，以及他们如何利用 AI 定量软件来简化解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Revolutionizing-Life-Science-An-Interview-with-SCIEX-on-ASMS-the-SCIEX-75002b-System-and-AI-Driven-Quantitation。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Revolutionizing-Life-Science-An-Interview-with-SCIEX-on-ASMS-the-SCIEX-75002b-System-and-AI-Driven-Quantitation。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60541774-43cc-4e62-988a-fc213d55c319 Fri, 14 Jun 2024 09:27:00 -0400 Revolutionizing Life Science: An Interview with SCIEX on ASMS, the SCIEX 7500+ System, and AI-Driven Quantitation
探索与骨关节炎相关的合并症骨关节炎是世界上最常见的关节炎，全球残疾和医疗保健利用的负担日益增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Exploring-the-comorbidities-linked-with-osteoarthritis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Exploring-the-comorbidities-linked-with-osteoarthritis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51d6d908-72c7-4c21-b0db-3a203ee88bcf Fri, 14 Jun 2024 09:24:00 -0400 Exploring the comorbidities associated with osteoarthritis
基于人工智能的液体活检技术有望及早发现癌症复发威尔康奈尔医学院、纽约长老会医院、纽约基因组中心 (NYGC) 和纪念斯隆凯特琳癌症中心的研究人员领导的一项研究显示，一种基于人工智能的检测血液中肿瘤 DNA 的方法在预测癌症复发方面表现出了前所未有的敏感性（MSK）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/AI-based-liquid-biopsy-technology-promises-early-detection-of-cancer-recurrence.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/AI-based-liquid-biopsy-technology-promises-early-detection-of-cancer-recurrence.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05762e2d-ea99-4934-9eec-6173e5d594b5 Fri, 14 Jun 2024 09:15:04 -0400 AI-based liquid biopsy technology promises early detection of cancer recurrence
影响人类身高和骨骼健康的隐藏基因开关在哺乳动物中，只有 3% 的基因组由编码基因组成，这些基因转录成蛋白质后，可确保生物体的生物学功能和未来个体的子宫内发育。但基因并不是单独发挥作用的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/The-hidden-genic-switches-influencing- human-height-and-bone-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/The-hidden-genic-switches-influencing- human-height-and-bone-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4cce3fce-2a0b-4f72-962a-f357f12291d2 Fri, 14 Jun 2024 09:10:28 -0400 The hidden genetic switches influencing human height and bone health
研究表明麻醉注射是青少年牙科患者最大的压力因素在拔牙前注射麻醉剂以进行正畸治疗，儿童会承受很大的压力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Study-reveals-anesthetic-injections-as-biggest-stress-factor-in-teen-dental-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Study-reveals-anesthetic-injections-as-biggest-stress-factor-in-teen-dental-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1ee4690f-fe1d-4d45-92ba-476a03f9d0ac Fri, 14 Jun 2024 08:51:00 -0400 Study reveals anesthetic injections as biggest stress factor in teen dental patients
与 Microsaic Systems 合作进行 Optimer 水监测将开发针对多种水传播病原体的新粘合剂。 Optimer 将支持连续水体监测以实现快速检测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Partnership-with-Microsaic-Systems-for-Optimer-enabled-water-monitoring.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Partnership-with-Microsaic-Systems-for-Optimer-enabled-water-monitoring.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d0708aac-065b-4c5e-8705-e5bd2514bd2e Fri, 14 Jun 2024 08:42:00 -0400 Partnership with Microsaic Systems for Optimer-enabled water monitoring
印第安纳州正在权衡医院垄断，其他地方的官员也在审查类似交易这座拥有 58,000 人口的城市的当地人习惯于在铁路道口等待每日数十列货运列车中的一列通过。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Indiana-weighs-hospital-monopoly-as-officials-elsewhere-scrutinize-similar-deals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/Indiana-weighs-hospital-monopoly-as-officials-elsewhere-scrutinize-similar-deals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a321f17-8241-44a5-80dc-00e9b9475473 Fri, 14 Jun 2024 07:39:01 -0400 Indiana weighs hospital monopoly as officials elsewhere scrutinize similar deals
加州立法者保留对老年残疾移民的援助加州立法者周四通过了 2024-25 年预算，拒绝了州长加文·纽瑟姆 (Gavin Newsom) 削减对缺乏合法居住权的低收入老年、盲人和残疾移民的家庭支持服务的提议。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/California-lawmakers-preserve-aid-to-older-disabled-immigrants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240614/California-lawmakers-preserve-aid-to-older-disabled-immigrants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c87ccdc-09d3-41b9-8b98-60d5cf39db39 Fri, 14 Jun 2024 07:37:37 -0400 California lawmakers preserve aid to older, disabled immigrants
